lyrics.stanza: I've got a river of life flowing within me; It makes the lame to walk and the blind to see. It opens prison doors, sets the captives free. I've got a river of life flowing within me.
Spring up, O well, within my spirit! Rise up and tell, so all can hear it! Spring up, O well, so I experience That life abundantly.
I've got a river of life flowing within me; It started gushing up when God set me free. That I keep the flow is my only plea. I've got a river of life springing within me.
Once I call His name there's a flow within; It turns me from my day, makes Him Lord again. As my spirit burns, Satan cannot win. Calling, "Oh Lord Jesus," keeps the flow within.
